Articles.Content:
Hi. I reinstall KSP probably every update. I recently installed Luna Multiplayer, and I also have an (I think non-functional?) copy of hangar expander. I have BDArmory, CameraTools, AviatorArsenal, and PhysicsRangeExtender, as well as MouseAimFlight, VesselMover, and Hyperedit. I also have BreakingGround and MakingHistory updated for their 1.7.3 versions.

Not especially a lot of mods or particularly crazy ones besides LMP.

For some reason, my KSP.log file is almost 3 GB in size. I can't actually open it in notepad.

Edited August 18, 2019 by Pds314

Very likely it's got thousands if not hundreds of thousands of lines with an error in it.

Exit and reload KSP, play for about a minute and then exit out, that will hopefully generate a smaller log that contains the errors.

Edited August 18, 2019 by 5thHorseman
